author: ehu
msg: Note: This commit also starts to centralize prop-path manipulation in
modifying prop-files and propfile-paths here (from log_do_committed()).
(svn_wc_transmit_prop_deltas): No longer leave a temp file behind.
Also implement in terms of svn_wc_get_prop_diffs().
svn_wc__working_props_committed() to query and modify prop files

author: dlr
msg: range separator lines and conflict resolution callbacks, which have

author: dlr
msg: Fix a latent bug in invocation of svn_wc_conflict_resolver_func_t,
which produced an incorrect conflict resolution result no-op
svn_wc_conflict_result_conflicted, when we know we'll have a merge
conflict if conflict resolution isn't successful.

author: dlr
msg: command-line arguments, outputing the error message and usage
instructions, rather than a stack trace.

msg: * subversion/po/fr.po: po-update + 4 fuzzy fixed and 2 old removed
